glosses: playable character in a video game
account in an online video game

examples.translation: Wait, I'll log in to my other account.

examples.text: Çok iyi çarsın. Keşke arkadaşım olsan.
examples.translation: You're a really nice person. Wish you were my friend.

etymology: From the pronunciation of char, abbreviation of English character, respelled using ⟨ç⟩.
